biotools.summary: A program for removing systematic variation in microarray gene expression data. Based on an analysis of how systematic variation contributes to variability in microarray data sets, this procedure includes background subtraction determined from the distribution of pixel intensity values and log conversion, linear or non-linear regression, restoration or transformation, and multiarray normalization.

bioschemas.name: SVN
